评论详情: I like that it is easy to get into & out of. Also fit perfectly. The material is soft, but holds up.
A little big but over all fits well

It was cute and well made for what it was, but it was unflatteringly large for being a small. For reference, I'm 5'2" 125 lbs and barely a 34B. The sleeves were falling off my shoulders and it was all around was too wide around my waist. Unfortunately has to return it. Please make a smaller size, I would buy it in a heartbeat!
Well made and very comfortable.

This vest was great for the costume I was creating, but it was a little longer than expected and has a box shape, as opposed to the tailored side seams in the product images. It held up well though, even after I wore it for several hours. It has a side zipper so you can get it on over your head, and don't have to unlace and re-lace it every time you wear it. Had I known this before I probably would've gotten a smaller size.
Nice vest but didn't fit me at all. In order to fit my waist, the shoulder straps were inches above my shoulders. Not the look I was going for.

评论概述: I would love it if the shoulders were better
评论详情: I ultimately ended up returning this vest. I really wanted to like it. It's cute and looks great, but the shoulders fit really weird. Maybe I have weird shoulders, I don't know. The shoulders just didn't sit right or look good and constantly were requiring adjustment and moving back onto my shoulders. I wore it around the house while getting ready for the renaissance faire and had to take it off before we left because it was driving me nuts. It could just be my shoulders, and if these work for your shoulders, this is pretty cute and had decent materials and lining. The stars off are really because of the annoying shoulder issue, but if this isn't an issue for you, this is a five star from me.

I think I should have sized down, but I didn't have time for it to arrive before my event. The fabric stretches a bit when worn, and the lacing doesn't stay tight. I may switch the lacing out.  The fabric is very soft, and I was able to easily add boning for a more authentic look and to make it lay flat. If you don't add the boning, you'll get some major gaping at the laces.  This is great for a costume, but I fear it won't stand up to constant use.
Worked great for cosplay.

评论概述: Fits well and is great material!
评论详情: I’m plus size and 40DD bra size and this fit well! It needs to be adjusted/untied and retied but other than that it’s great! The material is great quality as well.

This vest was so comfortable.  I wore it all day in over 75 degree weather. It has a zipper on the side for ease of putting on and taking off. I ordered the XL and probably would have been fine with a L.  It does run a little big but you can cinch it very tight. Cinching tight does cause that ripple affect in the front but I kind of like it and think its more flattering for my curves.  Also It doesn't have any boning so will not hold any frame or support.  But that just made it more comfortable to wear.  My only big wish would be to have one more eye hole at the bottom to bring the cinching down a little further over the skirt.  Other than that, it's great.  I would totally buy again.
Well made and as pictured.
This best runs a little small.
I'm 5'2" 168-170 lbs. 38F bra suze, 41" chest and aproximately a 35-38" waist  The fit is great! I tried several other brands first. This one fits the best.
Lovely fabric, great color, fairly good fit for off-the-rack. Did have a 3" front seam that wasn't sewn...

评论概述: Great for my Sarah Sanderson Costume
评论详情: I was dressing up to be Sarah Sanderson from Hocus pocus and bought this to wear over a see thrpugh long sleeved shirt. The color is as pictured. I followed the size chart and it was a little big on me but still worked, mostly the shoulder area was too big and would sometimes need adjusting to not show my bra straps. Overall good quality.

The bodice is genuinely nice looking and a soft fabric. It doesn't have any boning so it was very guppy. We opted to leave it open more that was planned. It looked ridiculous when we tried to tighten it.

I am so disappointed. This was made very well and is a really nice piece but it's Way too large. Im so bummed. I went online to see if there is an extra small but there is not. For reference, Im 5'4, wear a 32DD and am swimming in this.. So Bumed

评论概述: I liked it for my witch outfit
评论详情: I wanted to dress like renaissance fashion but decided on a witch outfit because well that’s just my favorite. I’m 5 ft, 168 lbs, short torso, can’t stand anything tight on me so ordered a 2x. 2x fits just right, not sure if an X-Large would even fit. Because I have a short torso the fit was great on me , someone with a longer torso it’s going to be really short on you. I wore this over a cute bell sleeve peasant top and with a long black skirt. Had to figure out how to loosen then fix how I wanted the strings in front, but not too difficult. I haven’t washed this yet so not sure how it would do, but I would definitely hang dry it. Honestly this could be used for a cute vest too for any day if the year with or without a shirt or dress underneath.
Fits great, a little cheap material but for the price its great....will last a few wearings.  I am 5'6", 130 pounds and cup B and fits great

I'm around 5' 4", 120 lbs, I usually wear a size small so ordered the small. The vest arrived very fast and felt high quality! Unfortunately, even while pulling the cord as tight as I could, the vest was too large/loose/baggy all over, which looked awkward especially in the chest and waist area and the shoulders would slip off. So I have to return :/

I studied reviews of multiple corsets and this one made the cut. It fit my body perfectly and had some give and take you could manually adjust thanks to the string lacing. It washed nicely as well, no issues after my first use so far.

I purchase this bodice to give my renaissance faire outfit a little something extra and it was absolutely perfect. I purchased the 2XL and it fit great, adjusting the lace up portion in the front was simple, and the zipper on the side made it that much easier to get on. I'm definitely recommending this to my other faire friends!
BUYER BEWARE WITH THIS COMPANY...THEY DO NOT PROVIDE SHIPPING FOR RETURNS! IT'S ON THE CUSTOMER TO PAY FOR IT AND PROVIDE YOUR OWN LABLES. PRODUCT IS CHEAP!!!!!!
Very nice quality an beautiful color.  Only bad thing is a small was too big.  My measurements are 36-25-36.  I wanted a snug fit.  But hopefully that gives ya'll a sizing guideline.
I order an Xl to be sure it would fit could have sized down but it works great especially if your layering. It was just as expected ☺️☺️
The feel of the fabric is nice and it’s well put together but it ran large. I’m a medium and orders a small and it was still too big on me.

Wish I would have spent more money on a quality corset. This does not lace up tight enough and it is so wide at the top it constantly fell off my shoulders all day. A smaller size would not have helped though, I think it would have been too tight in certain areas. It seems the maker of this just doesn't understand women's bodies.

This top is amazing! It’s a soft suede material on the outside and a smooth fabric on the inside. The shape is flattering and it isn’t too long. I ordered a large and it fits perfect. I’m 5’5” 150lbs with a large chest. This top makes my chest look very subdued, but that’s probably just because of the tshirt I tried it on with. To get it on just loosen the strings and put it over your head. Not too hard to get on at all!

After reading the reviews, I ordered a size small (one size down). It was pretty tight and didn’t give the fit I was looking for. I returned and reordered a medium and it’s perfect! It gives some shape in the waist, without being too tight up top. Very adjustable too
The vest it soft and not made cheap. It fit comfortably.
This product runs very small. I bought the 2x and ended up giving it to a friend who usually wears size medium in kids clothes. 🙃
Love this vest. It is very soft and comfortable to wear.
Good quality, comfortable and fits perfectly! I am a B cup and 28 ish inch waist! I ordered a small

评论概述: maybe not meant for anyone with a stomach?

I really wanted to love this brand too...
I got this for a renaissance fair outfit and I adore it, I’ll probably find a way to incorporate it into other outfits. I love the soft material, it’s supportive and adjustable
Love it, I did get a smaller size than what I had ordered but honestly it still fit!
I recommend buying 2 sizes to big because the vest has no stretch so it’s incredibly hard to get on and off along with that to breath in it is very hard.
It is a little smaller than I thought it would be based off measurements but it is beautiful and looks great.
This wasn't bad at all. It was just not flattering on my waistline and chest.
Very good accent piece for your wardrobe. Versatile, can be warn with any look. Nicely made, rich color, perfect fit.
For this you get what you pay for it was cuteish but I think if I would have spent a little more on something I would have been a lot happier
Terrible!  Cheaply made! Doesn't fit.  Do not recommend this product!
Got it for my mom she says it’s a little tight around bust have to squeeze into it but it’s nice and wearable

评论概述: Was very tight around upper abdomen and waist
评论详情: Is very pretty, but had to buy another, one size larger

Super nice quality beautiful piece and it actually fits!  I'm literally obsessed. 11/10 highly recommend, especially if you've been disappointed by other corset tops being way too small for the size you ordered. It's so cute. I feel like I could pair it with so many outfits.

I think it looks fairly nice quality for a costume piece. It is fairly thin. I ordered size small. I wear a 34a size bra so I don’t quite “fill out” the top and it’s almost too wide for my shoulders, so it’s a little bit baggier than I would like, but it’s not so bad that I’ll return it. I think a size smaller would have worked better if available, though. Keep in mind, there is no boning, so it will not act as a corset.
Fit perfectly! Looks like a corset but so much more comfortable

I bought this for my Hobbit costume and I'll wear it for Ren Faire this summer as well.It is beautiful! It feels nice, and quality made.  It is a little big at the top, but I am a B cup.  If the girls were bigger it would probably be perfect.
Well made renaissance vest. Perfect for high school drama production.

I wear a 44DD bra and usually a size 16 shirt.  To be safe I ordered a 2XL vest.  I couldn't even get it on... WAY TOO SMALL!  I would have needed a 4XL at least to get this on.  This item is NOT made for busty girls.  Additionally, the tying thread was shredding when I pulled it out of the bag.  Not the best quality item from Scarlet Darkness.
I absolutely love the way this fits

评论概述: Great fit for this busty girl
评论详情: This vest fit perfectly and the drawstrings allowed for tightening or loosening. It probably is better suited to someone with more bosom but I think it would look good with all body types. It seems sturdy, I tried it on with a lot of shirts and only wore it once. I thought about getting a boned style but wanted to be comfortable. It was!
Fits as expected. Better quality than expected.
Very well made. Fit is comfortable.  Perfect for ren faire dress.

This vest is very soft and has almost no structure. It's super comfy, but because it's so soft no matter how much you tighten it, it's going to gap if you have a slightly larger bust. I was initially going to return it because the gap was going to really bother me, but it ended up working perfect for a renn outfit I had planned. I'm glad I ended up keeping it, it's still a good product and I got a lot of compliments.

Wore this to the Ren Faire and was very happy with it. The laces are a bit fiddly, because I felt like it took me a while to get them to tie so there weren’t weird gaps across my chest while they laced tighter in other areas. Honestly though, sizing up probably would’ve helped in that respect.

This is not a real corset! But, it is a very comfortable alternative! I don’t think it was the best for my body type, it was not very flattering on me. But thinner people should have no issues! I also have pretty narrow shoulders and the shoulder straps are a bit wide set but it was not too much of an issue for me. It doesn’t feel cheap but doesn’t feel high quality either. It’s a great costume piece to have regardless!

For reference I have had this since June and the only way i can comfortably wear is is to have it loosely laces with knots tied at the ends of the string and leave it like that and even then if I sit down it either rides up or I’m afraid its gonna split at the seams. The fabric is also pulling away from the eyelet holes already and this is my first time actually wearing it. I was gonna try and fabric match and add an extra panel in the back to make it fit better but honestly? If I have to replace the eyelet holes too it’s not worth it. Next time I think I’m just gonna either get one of the waist corsets or get a real corset from Subculture. At least either of those will last longer.
Far better than expected and was good quality for the price.

评论概述: Super cute, a bit tough to put on
评论详情: I like this top- once you have it on it’s great. I basically had to take the laces out in order to get into it and lace it back up. Once you do that it’s great, but just plan on a few extra minutes when putting it on 😅
Color was just like the picture and the material is like a light microsuede. Great quality! I can pull it tight without worrying about it. Lovely fit.

I really like the design and material but the sizing isn't accurate to the size chart. I wear a 2x regularly but I got a 3x because i have a bigger chest and just in case and it was way too small. I know its supposed to be tight but it was still way too tight. Would definitely recommend to a friend but would make sure the size is bigger so it will fit right.

I have tried this on only twice, so as of yet I cannot vouch for it's longevity, I will update this if I find it needs to be mentioned. The bodice is well made and certainly matched the color I ordered it in (coffee)! The only comment I would make  is that it is certainly shorter than what is portrayed in the photos. Additionally, there is very little support (no boning or other structure for support). Even so, I would recommend it, for the price it is a very nice looking bodice.
While this fit ok, it is extremely flimsy. It bunches, rolls and curls up when I move so that I constantly need to readjust. While it served its purpose, I likely won't wear it again.

评论概述: Fits pretty well, great costume for a Ren Fest
评论详情: It fits well enough, good quality, nice looking.  I did notice some gapping or where the lacing was tighter in some parts and not in others like it wasn't even looking in the front entirely, but it wasn't too bad in general.  The string in the front is slippery I guess you could say.  If you could replace it with a suede string, it might stay in place better maybe.  Overall, the material is pretty good quality.  It's soft and there is no boning, so it is not a corset that holds you in or anything like that.  More like just a vest, but it is a good quality vest.  Great for a costume!
I ordered the medium and it fit quite well. The fabric is thin enough to stay cool, but not so thin that it feels cheap.
Love this. It looks longer in the pic, but it’s a beautiful item and fits great.
I ordered according to sizing chart. This did not fit and was not as described. I quickly returned and ordered from another vendor. I really wanted to love. This was a total waste of my time.

I ordered a 2XL (I normally wear an L or XL) and this vest was so small I couldn't even lace it past the second eyelet from the top. The 2XL was closer to a S t shirt size compared to my body. Material and quality appears to be good, but the sizing is way off.

I got a medium so I could wear it more like a corset. I left the tie out of 2 of the eyelet rows and wore a peasant top underneath. It worked perfectly and cinched up very nicely. Ended up being like a cropped corset style vest top.

I am 260lbs, 5'6", 40DD. This size is fine for a casual renaissance fair costume I'm making. A little on the tight side, but I will be wearing shapewear under everything.  If you're looking for a garment with strong support? This ain't it. It's perfectly fine as a top layer / accessory, but it is just a cloth vest. If you want something that does NOT require a bra, or something to accommodate a larger belly, find something with "stainless steel boning", like a corset or a set of stays.  As for this product: it is acceptable for what I personally need it to do. No more, no less.

评论概述: More like a vest than a corset- that being said, don’t expect it to cinch your waist
评论详情: I got this with the intention of wearing with a binder, and it fit exactly how I wanted and expected it to. I didn’t want my curves to stand out, and this vest isn’t meant for accentuating curves in the first place. So it worked out well, but I don’t think I’ll be keeping a $40 vest (again, not a corset) like this for many occasions lol.

I purchased a medium based on my measurements, but didn't factor in the laces. I probably would've been better off doing with a small. Luckily the difference isn't too extreme, and it's good enough to still be flattering. Thin material, but good for the price!

The material is not stiff.  It is not bones or has no shaping.  It is shaped to your body with laces.  It will wrinkle up if it is too tight, and that looks icky.  It will be ok if the bust measurement is a little small, but the waist must fit.
Good fabric and well made

First off, I was expecting the material to be a bit better quality for the price point, but it'll work. The main issue I had, though, was the fact that it was extremely baggy up top and would need quite a lot of tailoring to fit properly. I'm not well-gifted, but I'm not flat either. I ordered a small, but I've never had a small top have so much extra room. Even when it was as tight as possible, I would have needed close to a D-cup to fill it out. Reading the reviews I didn't expect it to be THAT much bigger... I decided it wasn't worth tailoring and returned it.

The product is cute and exactly what I wanted. It does happen to be a bit large though, I would recommend ordering a size down and only lacing as tightly as needed. I'm 5'7|130lbs  and a medium was a bit too large on me

Good quality product, but it runs very small. I normally wear a med/lg and after reading other reviews that said it is true to size I decided to play it safe and get the large instead of medium. It came tiny. Child sized. The large only fit my 10 year old.

This VEST(and yes, that's in the description, so pay attention. They are telling the truth) is not boned like a renfaire bodice. It is a fitted VEST.  If you want a quick and dirty lace up VEST that is not too expensive for a COSTUME, yes, this is a decent buy.  If you're looking for a BODICE (that'll actually hold up the girls) for GARB, you'll need something boned and of stronger construction. And probably a lot more expensive.
So this is very thin and runs very very small.  the stitching is also off in places.

评论概述: Nice but was a little big for me

Although I wear size medium clothes I ordered a large just in case. The fit is two sizes too small. Not usable or fixable. Very sad.

Arm movement is impossible. Shoulders are constantly falling down and do not want to stay up. Overall it's really short but too big length wise. Just sits on the body so weird.  I don't have curves but i do got DD. And there was so much room. Unwearable.

This is very flattering, looked cute with my skirt, wasn’t hot even after being outside in the Virginia heat all day at the fair. I liked the color. Wasn’t hard to tie, and stayed tied all day.  However, I was really disappointed at the time it took to ship. It changed several times before it arrived, also it faded on my white top which sucked.  I buy tops in size xl. I went up a size and it fit great.

I wear a 40DD, so I ordered a XL It needed to be about 6 inches larger. I have ordered other clothing (xl) and they have been true to size, but not this.  It is really soft and would look good if it fit I think.
It is probably 3 sizes too small. I know my bust size and this sizing is wrong.

Cute but to small. Can only lace it up half way.

评论详情: Smaller than listed on size chart
IT WAS SO COMFY AND HONESTLY WILL WEAR AGAIN! I WORE THIS ALL DAY FOR AN ACTIVE EVENT AND IT WAS SO PERFECT FOR MY COSTUME!

I bought a small and I’m returning it. The waist on this vest was the right size but the breasts were massive. I’m a size C so that’s not the issue. This vest looks like it was made for DD or larger. I don’t know too many women with tiny waists and massive breasts. Barbie comes to mind...

评论概述: Largest size is way too small
评论详情: Bought this as an option for a Renn Faire costume and it is waaaay too small.  I bought the 2X, which according to the size chart should fit me. I'm 5'9", 220ish lbs, 2X shirts, bra size 38D.  This simply did not fit my chest. When I pull the strings to loosen, there was barely enough for two or three rings, not even half of my bust. The arms did fit, however.  As for length it fits like a crop top, when the strings are extended all the way out.  I think this would be an ideal fit if you were at least 2 sizes smaller than me.
Ok to take this on and off I have to loosen nearly all the strings and then restring them, but honestly I think the look it gives is worth it.

评论概述: Dont waste your time or money
评论详情: I ordered this bc after paying $5.99 extra for shipping it said it would arrive on the Thursday before the Renaissance Faire (on Saturday). It was not shipped until Thursday (the day it was supposed to arrive). They changed the date of arrival to the Sunday after the Faire. No explanation of why it took so long to ship. The package arrived after the Faire. Now that im looking at the shirt in person, I wouldnt have worn it anyway. I got size XL and it barely covers my breast. It's super short. Dont waste your time. Itll arrive late and probably wont fit.
I normally wear a large but I sized up. However, I definitely wish I would have just ordered my regular size.

It doesn't have any structure, so if you want a corset affect or to wear it tightly you will need to your own boning. Tip: It was relatively easy to cut a small slit in the lining between the eyelets and the front center and insert some skinny zip ties right along the front seams to at least keep the lace part from collapsing with a tighter lacing. (No sewing necessary since the eyelets hold it in place.)

评论概述: Exactly what I was looking for!
评论详情: Bought this for my ren fair outfit. My crop top shows a little too much for my liking ever since I had my baby, but I love the sleeves & aesthetic with the skirt, so I was looking for something affordable to throw over the top of it.  I am roughly 5'5", and my measurements are 45" bust, 40" waist, 45" hip. I'm wearing the 2x vest. I personally wanted a tighter fit and the 2x is exactly that, but there is no stretch so a 3x would be better if you wanted the seams to be even all the way down.  Speaking of laces: they're the only thing I really wasn't happy with. They have nothing on the ends to keep them from fraying and they are a very slippery material. I literally tied them in a double knot that pulled itself undone when I bent over lol. Not a big deal in my book because I had already planned to replace them with something more functional, but unless you're getting a looser fit, I'd lace with something else.  All I've done so far is try it on so I have no idea as to the durability during a full day's outing, but it is a very nice quality and I would be surprised if it didn't hold up the same way as everything else in my closet.  Overall, I love it and want to try styling it with the rest of my clothes instead of just wearing it once as a costume like I originally intended!

评论概述: Worked for this plus size girl at faire!
评论详情: Honestly this worked great for a hot day at the faire. I stayed comfortable in it and didn't feel like I had to tug it into place all day. The laces can come unraveled at the ends but it didn't make them impossible to lace up. I loved it and I felt comfy all day!
The site recommended a medium. I ordered a large and it didn’t fit.  Need to go bigger(even with laces loose).
